result.title: Free ML & Spark trainings in San Francisco
result.content:
I know that this is not the first choice website for machine learning related information, but for those of you who would like to get into ML and big data I would like to recommend the following free workshops in San Francisco late August.

DeepSense.io is proud to offer free donation-class based machine learning and Spark entry-level workshops in San Francisco. Tune your professional expertise and kickstart your journey with big data. Sign up today here.
